name: Stuck in a Hoop (Tunahead)
description:
You play as Lula Loop your goal is to reach the exit. With your magic hoop you can catch enemies.

Controlls:

  • Arrow Keys for Movement
  •  Space to Jump
  • A to Throw your Hoop!

Enemies can be kicked if they’re STUCK IN A HOOP

Have Fun and enjoy!

TIP! Killed Enemies bring extra coins! See How many you can collect! The Counter resets after you die!
